document_data.mainbody: '''Clerebold Rillyn''' was a member of the noble [[patriar]] [[Rillyn]] family of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Clerebold had an idea he passed along to his cousin, [[Derque Rillyn]], to his usual praise. Clerebold suggested that [[Nortale's Hostel]], a non-profit hostel used to help refugees during the [[Absolute crisis]], should be renamed after Derque's daddy â€“ Hir Rillyn's Hostel, in order to convince him to donate a "good old chunk of change" in aid of the establishment and possibly even a bit of extra [[coin]] for Derque herself.
